allow: Bash(".venv\Scripts\python.exe" -c "from models import *; from extensions import db; import inspect; tables = [User, BlogPost, Category, Tag, MediaFile, Comment, Like, AIPrompt, AIUsageLog, LLMConfig, AnalyticsEvent, PageView, UserSession, SystemSetting, AuditLog, APIConfiguration]; print(''Tables in our models.py:''); [print(f''  - {t.__tablename__}'') for t in tables]")
